name: Rivaria
description:
Help clean the rivers of Rivaria!

Organize volunteers, petition the town to reduce waste and fight against greedy factory owners to remove as much trash from the waters as possible.

Manage your funds to buy more upgrades, colect more trash and clean all 5 areas of trash.

Made in 1 month for the #SeaJam, in support of #TeamSeas!
You should definitely donate to them if you haven't! TeamSeas.org

Loosely inspired by clicker games like Cookie Clicker, with a more involved mechanic of positioning volunteers to pick-up trash as efficiently. It has a few under-baked mechanics, like the town policies that are not really intuitive that I would've liked to have more time to rework, but the time limit really blindsighted me mid-way through development.

I over-scoped way too much during this project, and it shows in the lack of polish --I was close to abandoning it when I realised how little time I had left, but I just managed to get enough done to call it finished-- so I apologize for any rough edges left in. I hope they don't detract from the experience too much.

I really appreciate you playing the game <3
